query.value: @concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') = DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -',pipeline().parameters.IncDate,' DAY)')

oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *
  FROM CD_POSMGR.SA_ORDMST
 WHERE ORDYMD >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND ORDYMD <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM')),'YYYYMMDD');

SELECT *
  FROM CD_POSMGR.SA_ORDMST
 WHERE ORDYMD >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND ORDYMD <= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE-1),'YYYYMMDD');

SELECT *
  FROM CD_POSMGR.LO_OWHHD
 WHERE OWHREQSYMD >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND OWHREQSYMD <= TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1), 'MM')),'YYYYMMDD');

SELECT *
  FROM CD_POSMGR.LO_OWHHD
 WHERE OWHREQSYMD >= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')
   AND OWHREQSYMD <= TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE-1),'YYYYMMDD');
